article_title: Poll: Obama Approval Slips as Americans See Weakness
article_text:
By 29 point margin, Americans believe Netanyahu invite to Congress was a good thing: http://t.co/h3uS1Oo2CF

By *50 points,* Americans say O administration hasn't been aggressive enough with Iran: http://t.co/h3uS1Oo2CF

Favorable views of Israel by party: R's (71/17), Ind (62/21), D's (44/34). One of these things is not like the others http://t.co/h3uS1Oo2CF
